ca.ualberta.cs.corgFu

Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFu.Picture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Picture
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is an abstract class that performs all the needed methods required for handling pictures which includes determining whether or not the image meets the size requirements and finally associating the image to either the Answer/Question objects.
    Author:
    Anthony Wu, Oleksii Shevchenko
    See Also:
    Question, Answer, Serialized Form
